type.name: Booster Gang - cybered-up, cyberpsychotic thugs.

Combat Gangs - street "warriors".
Drug Gangs - dealers, makers, & takers of drugs.
Eco-Gangs - localized eco-terrorists.
Exotic Gangs - flaunting far-out biosculpts.
Go Gangs - skaters, bikers, & speed racers.
Guardian Gangs - guardian angels of the streets.

Nihilist Gangs - it's better to burn out than to fade awayâ€¦
Nostalgia Gangs - groups who dream of yesteryear.
Party Gangs - futuristic ravers and party animals.
Political Gangs - militant political activists.
Poser Gangs - walking in someone else's shoes.
Prank Gangs - street comedians who get the last laugh.
Puppet Gangs - corporate controlled youth.
Racist Gangs - preaching the superiority of the master race.

Theo-Gangs - oh yes, He's testing us! He's testing us..!

memberAge.name: 21 years old (Note that senior members of a gang may be much older)

expansion.name: No External Growth, Confined To One City.
Influence in 2 or 3 Cities in Same Region.
Influence in Four to Six Cities Nationwide.
